text.__SUMMARY__: Bulbophyllum mirum is a species of orchid in the genus Bulbophyllum. Its natural distribution is peninsular Thailand, Malaysia, and on Sumatra, Java, Borneo and the Lesser Sunda Islands of Indonesia. It grows in humid montane forests at altitudes from 1,000 m (3,300 ft) to 1,600 m (5,200 ft).
